title: Check out the newest Diamond in the sky for MSFS - The Diamond Da-42!
description:
In this video we will look at a new aircraft which has landed in the MSFS store. 

The Diamond DA-42 is a versatile twin-engine aircraft manufactured by Diamond Aircraft Industries. Introduced in 2002, it is popular for flight training, personal use, and even military applications. The DA-42 is known for its impressive fuel efficiency, burning fuel like a single-engine aircraft while offering the added safety of a second engine. It features advanced avionics, including Garminâ€™s Synthetic Vision Technology, which enhances situational awareness by providing a 3D depiction of the terrain. With a maximum range of 1,225 nautical miles and a cruising speed of 197 knots, the DA-42 is well-suited for cross-country flights.

If you look at the details of the aircraft based on the screenshots which are provided by the vendor you would agree that this is a nice one to add to your collection.

For a full overview of items added to the marketplace this week have a look at the video below:
https://youtu.be/UcOoP-Y0RG0
